data.title: Queer Trans Ks - Michigan7 2016
data.meta_description: Queer Trans Ks - Michigan7 2016 - Free ebook download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read book online for free. This document contains an outline of topics related to queer and transgender studies in international relations and political theory. It includes sections on the uniqueness of queer perspectives, links to other topics, anthropology, border disputes, (anti-)capitalism, diplomacy, data science, pinkwashing, realism, the economy, Taiwan, antiblackness, identity formation, security studies, nationalism, the state, feminism, the environment, war, alternatives like queer IR and methods like disidentification. It provides a framework to debate these issues and considers alternative perspectives.
